مقابلة مع حسن أحمد الأسدي
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Expulsion--Palestine--History--20th century

Palestine--History--British Mandate, 1922-1948

oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Agricultural land lease; Arbitration; Children's games; Dwellings; Family structure; Land ownership; Living conditions; Minorities; Population; Qurʼānic teaching; Schools; Shaykhs; Water wells; Women education; Akka (Palestine); Arab Revolt, 1936-1939; Arrest; British army camps; British authorities; Marriage; Palestine Railways; Routes; Schools; Strikes; Terrorism; Vandalism; World War, 1939-1945; al-Jāmiʻah al-ʻArabīyah; Arab Salvation Army; Buses; Decision making; Economic aid; Expulsion; International Committee of the International Committee of the Red Cross; Majd al-Kurūm (Palestine); Military withdrawal; Propaganda; Refugee camps; Refugee experience; Skirmishes; Trains; Water wells; Absentee property laws; Israeli colonization; Land ownership
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on June 20, 1997 with Ḥasan Aḥmad al-Asadī, male, born in 1922 in Dayr al-Asad, Palestine and resides in ʻAyn al-Ḥilwah Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon. He worked with the British Army.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع حسن أحمد الأسدي في 20 حزيران يونيو عام 1997، ذكر، ولد عام 1922 في دير الأسد، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم عين الحلوة للاجئين الفلسطنيين، لبنان. عمل مع الجيش البريطاني.

oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: الطفولة والتربية والتعليم قبل النكبة في دير الأسد. (@ 0:00)
